title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, November 30, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss writes to his wife on his birthday, telling her of skirmishing and a possible battle in the near future.
keywords: Family, Women, Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Troop Movement, Prisons/Prisoners, Military Authority, Patriotism, American Civil War
